param.name: cutoff
param.label: Maximum distance between a gene/peak pair before it is omitted from the analyses (bp)

param.name: number
param.label: Maximum number of gene/peak pairs to report from the analyses

param.name: promoter_start
param.label: Start of promoter region with respect to gene TSS

param.name: promoter_end
param.label: End of promoter region with respect to gene TSS

param.name: edge
param.label: Gene 'edges' to consider in distance calculations

param.name: compact_format
param.label: Use 'compact' output format
param.help: Puts all hits for each peak or gene on a single line (--compact)

param.name: pad_output
param.label: Output same number of lines for each peak
param.help: Add blank lines in output for peaks with fewer than maximum number of hits (--pad)

param.name: summary
param.label: Output additional 'summary' datasets
param.help: Summaries contain only the top hits for each peak or feature (--summary)
